item.title: The Original Websleuth — Todd Matthews | Criminal Impact
item.description: An overview of Todd Matthews’ role in online criminal investigations, highlighting his work in solving cases and the impact of digital sleuthing on law enforcement.

item.title: Boy With Severe Autism Was NEGLECTED By Care Workers
item.description: A report highlights concerns over the care provided to a child with severe autism, focusing on verified incidents and the responses from authorities.
